title: Client is being a Bitch
body: When I get into a blind pick/draft pick game, I will hover my champion, and the lock in button will go grey, when I try to change my runes in game, it will not let me save, the save button does nothing and when I press the x button to exit out of the rune page, it'll say "are you sure, you have not saved yet" and I will press save and nothing will happen, I have already gotten 2 dodge penalties and 1 leaverbuster for this stupid client bug. And repairing and restarting has done nothing....

replies.body: You can try the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and I would recommend telling it to force a repatch. Let's just see if the patch didn't apply properly. If that doesn't work then we can try other steps. Let me know!
